name: Toppy's Toy Shop
description:
A NO-JUMPSCARE SURVIVAL HORROR GAME

by HawkSandwich

You're in an evil toy shop. Burn toys to grow the fire, eventually burning the entire shop to the ground. Monsters will try to kill you, so you have to fight for your survival.

Donations so far (itch.io & game jolt):

$10.00

(Thanks so much to everyone who donates <3)

-Standard first person movement

-Fairly low-end system requirements

-5 to 15 minute play session

-No jumpscares

-Made by one guy

If you'd like to donate, you can purchase the game for more than $0.00. I'd appreciate it infinitely :)
